data.name: Nox Terrorem: Lost Souls Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the powerful, chilling soundtrack to Nox Terrorem: Lost Souls, written by composer Jake Menear!

This 15-track collection contains most of the game's original, haunting soundtrack, along with two bonus tracks not featured in the game!
data.about_the_game:
This is the powerful, chilling soundtrack to Nox Terrorem: Lost Souls, written by composer Jake Menear!

This 15-track collection contains most of the game's original, haunting soundtrack, along with two bonus tracks not featured in the game!
data.short_description: A powerful, haunting soundtrack featuring music from the game Nox Terrorem: Lost Souls.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headphones recommended
